snippet: A Novak Djokovic-led Serbia surprisingly fell behind 2-1 at home to Kazakhstan in the Davis Cup first round after he lost in doubles on Saturday....
lead_paragraph: A Novak Djokovic-led Serbia surprisingly fell behind 2-1 at home to Kazakhstan in the Davis Cup first round after he lost in doubles on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Davis Cup: Italy, France Reach Quarters, Serbia Trail
headline.main: Davis Cup: Italy, France Reach Quarters, Serbia Trail
